title: Research Assistant
description:
Migrated a site from Jekyll to Next.js 14 (TypeScript, Tailwind); converted YAML content to typed JSON to improve maintainability and performance.
Built filterable Team/News/Publications modules and shipped via GitHub-to-Vercel CI/CD with linting and analytics for reliable releases.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Automated Magento deployment on Ubuntu with Ansible + SMTP setup, reducing deployment time by 75%.
Improved mobile UX and configurable product workflows (+40% inventory efficiency); integrated secure payment flow and SEO improvements.

title: Software Developer Intern
description:
Developed a price prediction system (Linear Regression) achieving 92% accuracy and cutting estimation time by 75%.
Deployed a Flask REST API with Redis + MySQL for sub-second predictions; improved model quality via outlier handling and feature engineering (+38%).
